reviews.review_text: I have purchased these mirrors in the past. They are just right for my needs. The price on Amazon for one of these same mirrors was $26. The Walmart price for 2 of these mirrors was $14, pretty much a no-brainer. Granted that this was a featured discount, but it worked for me! I did have to buy a few other items to reach the minimum purchase amount, but there's always something I need around the house or for my residential real estate business.

Great mirror for the price. Ordered second one. Comes with two screws and hook taped on the back. Not sure how that would work without breaking mirror, so I decided to take another reviewer's suggestion and purchase 3M removable hanging tape to attach to wall.

reviews.title: Need more
reviews.review_text: This mirror is simple, affordable, and does exactly what I needed. It's lightweight but sturdy enough to hang or lean against the wall. The black frame is minimal and clean, so it fits well with almost any decor. The size is great for checking outfits without taking up too much space. It arrived well-packaged with no cracks or damage. For the price, it's a great value and I'd definitely rebuy it and have.

The mirror looks great in my bedroom. The color white looks great against my beige walls. I love that sun reflects on mirror , making room brighter. The price was very reasonable. The height and size is just what I needed. I do recommend this product and I plan to purchase another for guest bedroom

reviews.title: Cute on a budget
reviews.review_text: My daughter requested a mirror for her room so when I found this one, I was really excited. It's not super heavy, which I like and it looks really nice. The big con for me is it's really difficult to get it to adhere to the wall. It came with a bracket for a picture frame, which did not work at all. I ended up having to use something else to anchor it to the wall.

I'm not sure what I was expecting in a mirror of this price. I needed one and I HAD to watch my spending. I saw this, here online, and I figured that it was WORTH a TRY. BOY was I ever surprised! Although, it is VERY delicate it has a GREAT reflection. It appears to really tell the truth! There is NO warping or "Fun House" effect...being 75 "ain't no picnic to look at", but it's a fine mirror! Every so often I try looking my best and being in a wheelchair made it quite difficult to use the bathroom mirror OR the one in my compact. I can see ALL of me for the first time in DECADES and I must say that it's NOT merely a great convenience, IT WAS A TERRIFIC BARGAN!!!

reviews.title: Too much distortion
reviews.review_text: I got what I paid for. The mirror arrived in one piece, which was great. But as mentioned by other reviewers, the distortion was just too annoying. I looked like my legs had been unnaturally elongated. So I ordered another mirror from a different store and it arrived broken. Time to go find one in person!

reviews.title: good value, delivered cracked
reviews.review_text: I bought this mirror a few months back. it was delivered in a timely manner but when I gifted it to someone they unwrapped the store packaging and the mirror had been cracked at the entire bottom of the mirror so delivery wasn't handled well. I now have to buy another one to replace it

reviews.title: Never receive mirror for the 2nd time
reviews.review_text: This is the SECOND time I've tried ordering this mirror %26 both times they don't deliver the mirror? What is happening? I just want my mirror lol! Like, why is it an issue not once but twice now? What is the issue with this brand not getting this mirror delivered? The sad thing is I'm going to try again😭

Both mirrors delivered all smashed up. Packaging was poor and delivery people not careful about the delivery process and instructions on labels. Clearly marked fragile but guess that didn't mean anything. Very disappointed as I was looking forward to adding these to my wall decor.

I thought I ordered over the door mirror but my mistake I got the one that goes on the wall. This Actually worked out in my favor! The Only dislike is putting the sticky tag directly on the mirror itself. I couldn't remove all that special glue that you use. It got a little messy. I would suggest putting it somewhere else.

reviews.title: Elegant, sturdy—so good I bought a second one!
reviews.review_text: This is my second gold mirror, and I'm just as impressed as the first time. The slim gold frame is elegant without being flashy, and it instantly elevates the room. The size gives a true head-to-toe view with a clear, undistorted reflection. It feels sturdy and well-made for the price, and it was easy to position where I wanted it. It brightens up small spaces and makes them feel larger, and the gold tone pairs nicely with both modern and traditional decor. Fantastic value, highly recommend!

it's a nice mirror it's a perfect size for I need it the only thing I didn't like is that the things have to be attached to put it over the door I would have liked them to have something adhesive that I could just stick it to the door like I had years ago but otherwise it's a nice mirror just hard for me to put those hangers on and put it on myself because I can't reach I'm very short

reviews.title: Cracked mirror
reviews.review_text: I was excited about receiving this mirror. However the mirror was delivered to the door on a rainy day, laid out on the pavement and was only wrapped in the plastic package. There was no box or anything to prevent or cushion the glass from breaking. I didn't get to use it because once opening it was cracked.

reviews.title: a dependable staple mirror 🙂
reviews.review_text: I have used this type of mirror from Walmart for so many years. I have one in bathroom %26 bedroom. They can be used to decorate with too so another purchase is likely for me. I'm always happy with these mirrors and their uses, there are different color frames to match rooms you could paint the frame too. They're budget friendly so I keep coming back for more. Fits very well on a door and easy to hang most anywhere.

reviews.title: Mirror low quality
reviews.review_text: I feel like the image is slightly elongated, it's weird. I tried to also use double sided tape to secure to wall for added safety, don't do it to the back of the mirror. the mirror fell and the double sided tape stuck to the wall with the cardboard peeled away from mirror still attached.

reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For
reviews.review_text: I purchased this mirror to hang on the back of my door. The appearance and quality of the mirror were exactly as expected. I received exactly what I paid for, and there was no assembly required. I am pleased with my purchase. I can not upload a picture because I have not yet hung the mirror on the door..

reviews.title: Classy, Beautiful and Simple
reviews.review_text: Love these mirrors, classy not over top very simple. One caveat you will need additional reinforcement such as the mirror clips to make sure it stays. we placed using one their backing and two sided tape. But the mirror clips sealed the deal lol. But it is beautiful

I ordered a " hangover the door" mirror but received a hang on the door mirror. The mirror did not come in a box. When i took it to a FedEx store to return it as directed by the website, the FedEx person told me that the item needed to be wrapped in bubble wrap, then put into a box when he asked where the box was that it came in i told him that it did not come in a box %26 was left at my front door as is. He then told me that i would have to buy a box %26 bubble wrap, but they didn't have a size for the mirror. Therefore, I would need to buy a larger box, and the total would be approximately $35.00 to ship it back for the return. Needless to say, I was not going to spend $35.00 to return an item that was less than $9.00.

reviews.title: Clear, beautiful, inexpensive mirror.
reviews.review_text: Beautiful full length mirror in just what I needed in my bedroom. My daughters won't believe what I paid for it, but stopped by Wal-Mart on their way home to purchase one for themselves. It's clear, no blemish or distortions. I have paid a lot more for less in my lifetime. Thank you Wal-Mart.

Gave this 3 star because my store is in a mall and they delivered them to the wrong store and I had to go find them. I only knew because the driver took pic of the delivery for proof of delivery so I could see that they just dropped them off at the most convenient place (Dick's Sporting) instead of finding my store in the mall. I had even called the driver who didn't answer to tell him where my store was located as well as sent a chat message. They still did not respond to either. This was 12 full length mirrors and they were delivered unboxed, unwrapped, unprotected and without any labeling on them to indicate what store they belonged to and they were left at the checkout desk at front door of Dick's in a shopping cart. Luckily the Dick's store manager took my phone call about them and secured them for me until I could pick them up. Poor service, Walmart.

I love this little mirror. It goes perfectly with my white vanity and wardrobe. It's just the right size, full length but not big and bulky so it fits behind my door perfectly. It's very elegant looking especially for the price. Totally recommend it!

reviews.title: Mainstay mirror
reviews.review_text: So I've had plenty of these mirrors in my life. I'm on a budget and really needed a full length mirror and it does the job. It's under 10 dollars and I just checked the back to see if there was a way to hang it up, and there are 2 screws and that lil hanging thing taped to the back. Now that I think about it I should have checked to see if they had ones w black edging so it would match my bed frame. Or even brown to match my furniture but it's all good. I could hang it in the bathroom I guess. But yep it's a mirror that is 4 '1" long. It'll work. Thanks

The delivery driver just left my purchase on the front porch, where it could have easily been stolen, instead of taking it to my apartment, which is only just a few feet away. Apparently the driver is either too lazy or just too stupid to deliver a product properly. Very displeased with the driver's carelessness.

reviews.title: Unpackaged mirror delivered to the wrong address
reviews.review_text: First of all, the delivery female delivered my mirror to the wrong house: 5132 Clydedale. One street over. Pay attention. Read! To make matters wrost, the mirror is layed on the wrong home's bench, exposed. Not box, no packaging. I obviously need to cancel the rest of my order from walmart.com. Simply lazy! So unprofessional!

reviews.title: delivery not so good
reviews.review_text: I ordered this to be delivered. the delivery person laid them out on my porch in the rain instead of propping this against the house. the rain went thru the glass to the back and ruined the backing. it was pouring rain. they could have at least opened the outside door and put them between the two doors. they wouldn't have gotten soaked there.
